Kids.title: The Quest of Jette and Blu
Kids.description: Jette, a girl with chestnut hair, meets a blue dragon named Blu in an ancient forest and they form a strong bond. Together, they embark on a series of adventures, encountering magical creatures and overcoming challenges. (12min 42sec)

Kids.title: 'Blu' the Blue Dragon
Kids.description: Once upon a time, in a magical kingdom far, far away, there lived a magnificent blue dragon named Blu. Blu was no ordinary dragon; he had striking blue scales that shimmered like the ocean under the moonlight. But what made him truly unique were his big, beautiful blue eyes that sparkled like the stars in the night sky. (3min 31sec)

Kids.title: The Dreamy Moon Adventure
Kids.description: Once upon a time, in a land not too far away, there was a sleepy little town called Stardustville. In Stardustville, everyone knew that the best adventures happened when the moon was shining brightly in the night sky. Every night, as the sun set and the stars began to twinkle, the moon would come out to play. The moon was a friendly and gentle creature who loved to watch over the town and its sleepy residents. (3min 22sec)

Young.title: Frankenstein
Young.description: Victoria Frankenstein creates a creature who learns language and desires companionship but is met with fear and rejection. This leads to isolation, despair, and a tragic end. (10min 01sec)

Young.title: Child of the Wildwood
Young.description: An enchanting tale about Kiran, a human boy raised by wolves in a jungle. It follows his upbringing among the animals, mentored by wise creatures like Balu the bear and Bagheera the panther. (4min 27sec)

Young.title: The Eternal Amulet
Young.description: A mystical amuletâ€™s power sparks a battle between heroic Guardians and a treacherous sorcerer, forging unity and hope in Eldoria. (7min 33sec)

Music.title: The Ballad of Jette and Blu
Music.description: Blu a magic dragon that lives by the sea, becomes friends with young Jette. (4min 21sec)

Music.title: Blu the Dragon
Music.description: Joyful kids' pop anthem about a friendly dragon, with playful sounds and upbeat energy. (2min 29sec)
